content: the garden tulip shawl makes the most of one skein of rico design creative cotton camouflage for a timeless versatile accessory its lightweight breathable cotton makes it perfect for any season while the delicate lace edging adds a touch of understated elegance whether draped casually over the shoulders or wrapped snugly around the neck this shawl is both stylish and practical a beautiful blend of comfort and charm **skill** knitting **difficulty** easy **sizes** one size **finished measurements** wingspan 40 depth 20 **materials** **rico design** *creative cotton camouflage* 1 45% acrylic 44% cotton 11% polyamide 200g/634 yds 002 rose garden 1 ball needle us size 4 3 5 mm 32 or longer circular to accommodate large number of stitches or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle stitch markers **gauge** 18 sts x 36 row = 4 in garter stitch after blocking save time check your gauge **pattern notes** this shawl is knit from the top down starting with a garter tab directional increases shape the sides while a center panel maintains the same number of stitches the shawl is finished off with a garter and eyelet border with a picot bind off this pattern is both written and charted for your convenience 1 https //universalyarn com/products/383356
